name: Canadian Higurashi
description:
Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the winter of 2006 and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. One of Keiichi's classmate start to act strange and ask him all sort of weird question. While trying to help her, he unearth the darkness that lurks over seemingly idyllic life they lead.

This games is a parody of the visual novel/anime Higurashi no Naku Koro ni. It contains  spoilers for both the original and the 2020 anime (Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Gou). 

This game contains no spoilers for Umineko or Ciconia, aside for a few minor sound effects.

The page for this game will be delisted on April 14th.
